headline: Equity Residential Receives Nareit 2024 Residential Leader in the Light Award
summary: CHICAGO, November 25, 2024--Equity Residential (NYSE: EQR), a recognized leader in corporate responsibility, today announced that the Company was named Nareit’s 2024 Leader in the Light recipient for the Residential sector. This is the fourth time that Equity Residential has received this honor. The Leader in the Light awards are given to REITs that demonstrate leadership in implementing sustainable and socially responsible investment and operating practices, good governance and transparency.
